CmsPageTemplate.description: Basic template outline, based on a bare-bones decorator
Advanced global/backend template, based on GlobalDecorator logic; by default, primarily targets backend support
Advanced shop/frontend template, based on ShopDecorator logic

CmsAssetTemplate.description: Demo Asset Template for global reuse (NOTE: no attributes, no explicit includes needed)

CmsAttributeTemplate.inputHelp: This is a demo boolean with script support.
This is a demo integer with script support.
This is a demo text with script support, manually cast to Double.

CmsAssetTemplate.description: Demo asset template 3, for global reuse (ElectronicText example)

CmsPageTemplate.description: Demo template for CMS, analogous to Admin LayoutDemo screen

CmsAttributeTemplate.inputHelp: This is a demo boolean with script support.
This is a demo integer with script support.
This is a demo text with script support, manually cast to Long.

CmsPage.description: Basic bare-bones page example demonstrating Basic Template
Advanced page example demonstrating Advanced Template Global (Backend). Note: This page only runs global/backend decorator logic, not shop/frontend decorator logic

ElectronicText.textData:
{"title":"Advanced Template Global Example Page","customCssFile":"","customJsFile":"","mainContent":{"title":"Test","content":"

h1. heading

h2. heading

h3. heading

h4. heading

h5. heading
h6. heading

Content

Shields up. I recommend we transfer power to phasers and arm the photon torpedoes. Something strange on the detector circuit. The weapons must have disrupted our communicators. You saw something as tasty as meat, but inorganically materialized out of patterns used by our transporters. Captain, the most elementary and valuable statement in science, the beginning of wisdom, is 'I do not know.' All transporters off.

This is a link to nowhere!

Unidentified vessel travelling at sub warp speed, bearing 235.7. Fluctuations in energy readings from it, Captain. All transporters off. A strange set-up, but I'd say the graviton generator is depolarized. The dark colourings of the scrapes are the leavings of natural rubber, a type of non-conductive sole used by researchers experimenting with electricity. The molecules must have been partly de-phased by the anyon beam.


Special elements

This is a quote!

More content and an hr element


Tables & List-Elements

Header CellHeader Cell
ContentContent
  • Uno
  • Dos 
  • Tré Cool
  1. Yes
  2. No
  3. Maybe
"}}

CmsPage.description: Advanced page example demonstrating Advanced Template Shop (Frontend)

{"title":"Advanced Template Shop Example Page","customCssFile":"","customJsFile":"","mainContent":{"title":"Test","content":"

h2. heading

h3. heading

h4. heading

h5. heading
h6. heading

Content

Shields up. I recommend we transfer power to phasers and arm the photon torpedoes. Something strange on the detector circuit. The weapons must have disrupted our communicators. You saw something as tasty as meat, but inorganically materialized out of patterns used by our transporters. Captain, the most elementary and valuable statement in science, the beginning of wisdom, is 'I do not know.' All transporters off.

This is a link to nowhere!

Unidentified vessel travelling at sub warp speed, bearing 235.7. Fluctuations in energy readings from it, Captain. All transporters off. A strange set-up, but I'd say the graviton generator is depolarized. The dark colourings of the scrapes are the leavings of natural rubber, a type of non-conductive sole used by researchers experimenting with electricity. The molecules must have been partly de-phased by the anyon beam.

{"title":"Demo Page","customCssFile":"/website/data/example.css","customJsFile":"/website/data/example.js","demo_bool_1":"false","demo_bool_2":"${parameters.demo_bool_2 == 'true'}","demo_integer_1":"1234","demo_long_1":"${groovy:(demo_integer_1 + 1234)}","leftContent":"[@asset name='DemoMenu' webSite='cmsSite' def='global' attribs={'type':'sidebar'}/]","mainContent":{"title":"Demo Page","content":"

Demo Content. Demo page URL.

"},"demoAsset2":{"testContent":"current webapp name: ${webappName}","demo_bool_1":"false","demo_bool_2":"${not empty parameters.demo_bool_2}"},"demo_integer_1":"1234","demo_double_1":"${groovy:(demo_integer_1 + 1234.12)}","secondaryContent":{"title":"Hello 2","content":"

Demo content for secondary instance of section asset.

"},"trivialContent":{"content":"
